title: Research Guitar Types
description: Investigate acoustic, electric, and classical guitars to determine which suits your preferences and budget.

title: Set a Practice Schedule
description: Allocate specific times each week for guitar practice. Consistency is key!

title: Find a Beginner Guitar Course
description: Search for online resources, local guitar teachers, or beginner guitar classes.

title: Purchase a Guitar and Accessories
description: Buy a guitar, picks, a tuner, and potentially a strap (if electric/acoustic) based on your research.

title: Practice Basic Chords
description: Start learning easy chords like G, C, D, and Em. Practice smooth transitions between them.
